name: A Ducks Tail
description:
Shucks... humans back onto your pond. Whelp, you better bite a bullet to go fend off your home!

Hit the enemies out of your pond to gain score and money. Use the shop to upgrade yourself and try to get the best score possible.

Controls:

W -Up

A -Left

S -Down

D - Right

Left Click -Dash

Esc - Pause
